casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 25, 2008

[Cite as 0912512008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-4854.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-1520. AEGIS v. Sedlacko.

Mahoning App. No. 07 MA 128, 2008-0hio-3190. On September 18, 2008, appellant filed a motion seeking reconsideration of this court’s September 10, 2008 decision denying the motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that the motion for reconsideration in this case is stricken as prohibited by S.Ct.Prac.R. XI(2).
